name: web.get_page_content
description: Extract the readable content from the given page URL in the Markdown format.

url.description:
A string starting with 'http://' or 'https://' or '@' and a number (1..k, both ends included)
to get the URL from the last `search_topk` call (e.g. '@1' to get the content of the first URL)

returns: A markdown string with the page content

name: web.search_topk
description: Get top K search results for the given query (just like in actual browser with a search engine).

query.description: The search query in a natural form

k.description: The amount of pages to return (default: 5)

returns: A list of K dictionaries with URLs and their descriptions
